title: If the item is broken on WW and pretty much crap on everyone else...
body: Why are you going to nerf the item instead of Warwick, or at least his specific, obscenely broken, interaction with it?  Is there even a remotely good reason for avoiding the actual problem?

replies.body: While yes, the Skirmisher/Devourer is broken on Warwick it's far from shit on everyone else. Both my Nocturne and Skarner disagree with you.
I mean the skirmishers part, I know devourer is quite good.  It seems like apart from WW, you'd always get more out of taking the slow instead.

Not really. Any duel-centric champs do well with it. Once again, Skarner and Nocturne. Even Rengar to a point, unless you're playing the bursty Rengar instead of the sustained damage one. Reducing the damage dealt to you while increasing the damage you do is extremely helpful for anyone who relies on auto attacks to win trades.

It's both the item and the champion
WW has a ult has really has no counterplay in LANE when you are a solo champ. You either stay away or take it and pray it's not enough

Trailblazer lets anyone become good at farming

the item is good on everyone, you're crazy. most champions that you think should be grabbing warrior are getting devourer anyways even when they want to win fast because it simply starts at too high a value for an on-hit.

I mainly meant the smite mod, not Devourer in general. The part that gives you bonus true damage on hit after smiting a champ is just specifically nuts for WW and not really impressive for anything else i can think of unless lucian starts jungling :)

Literally any auto attack based jungler can use it.  It works well on Aatrox, fiora, yi, diana (though not my first choice on her), Udyr, xin, and even lee sin. Also since you will be fighting without the smite buff 55 out of every 60 seconds i think the base stats are a bit more important.

They're nerfing WW and the item is overpowered.

Udyr and Xin also deal insane amounts of damage with Devourer.
